title: Goldman Sachs' Best Strategies for Utilities Stocks in 2026
description: Carly Davenport, U.S. utilities analyst at Goldman Sachs, says the firm expects increased natural gas use, fewer coal plant retirements, more nuclear power added to the grid, and continued growth in renewables. She speaks with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close.” (Source: Bloomberg)
